title: ✉️ Pain Point Outreach - 7:00 AM
content:
PAIN POINT OUTREACH (7:00 AM)

Drafted personalized responses to high-value pain points (score 8+).

OUTREACH SUMMARY:
• Customized messaging by audience (Coaches vs Parents vs Club Leaders)
• Soft CTAs (walkthroughs, free trials, info calls)
• Pain-angle tagged for tracking effectiveness
• Saved to /courtlab-crm/outreach-drafts/[DATE]/

DRAFTS READY FOR APPROVAL:
✅ Recruiting Clarity angle: "Help coaches identify talent faster"
✅ Tracking & Data angle: "Transparent progress for parents & coaches"
✅ Time-Efficiency angle: "3-minute weekly tracking"

Awaiting Michael approval before sending via Reddit DM, Twitter reply, or email.
